metadata.title: Spleasy - Split bills instantly
metadata.description: The simplest way to track shared expenses without sign-ups.

home.title: Split bills instantly.
home.subtitle: No sign-up.
home.description: As the name suggests, we make splitting bills easy. Just create a group, share the link, and start splitting.

instantAccess.title: Instant Access
instantAccess.description: No accounts, no passwords, no email verification. Just generate a secure link and share it with your friends to get started immediately.

splitEasy.title: Split Easy
splitEasy.description: Add expenses, select who was involved, and let Spleasy calculate the math. Ensure everyone pays exactly what they owe.

transparentSafe.title: Transparent & Safe
transparentSafe.description: Everyone sees the same data in real-time. Secure your group with a PIN code for privacy without complex login flows.
